item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. An analysis of DeepSeek's R1-Zero and R1 (435 points | 175 comments)
2. Blueskyfeedbot: Post RSS Feeds to Bluesky via GitHub Actions (73 points | 29 comments)
3. OpenAI says it has evidence DeepSeek used its model to train competitor (477 points | 1281 comments)
4. SmolGPT: A minimal PyTorch implementation for training a small LLM from scratch (237 points | 30 comments)
5. Building a T1D smartwatch for my son from scratch (248 points | 36 comments)
6. Advice for a friend who wants to start a blog (106 points | 54 comments)
7. Proper decoupling capacitor practices, and why you should leave 100nF behind (49 points | 18 comments)
8. Commercial jet collides with Black Hawk helicopter near Reagan airport (212 points | 160 comments)
9. Mathesar – an intutive spreadsheet-like interface to Postgres data (58 points | 9 comments)
10. From C++ to Clojure: Jank language promises best of both (107 points | 28 comments)
11. Classic Duck Hunt game made in JavaScript and Kaplay (38 points | 14 comments)
12. Exposed DeepSeek database leaking sensitive information, including chat history (479 points | 316 comments)
13. Parsing PDFs (and more) in Elixir using Rust (91 points | 10 comments)
14. Etleap (YC W13) Is Hiring a Senior Software Engineer (SF) ( | hide)
15. Asteroid Impact on Earth 2032 with Probability 1% and 8Mt Energy (254 points | 212 comments)
16. A major Postgres upgrade with zero downtime (134 points | 45 comments)
17. Airflow – Stream media files directly from macOS to AirPlay devices (96 points | 37 comments)
18. When the Sackler brothers studied LSD (9 points | discuss)
19. Case Study: ByteDance Uses eBPF to Enhance Networking Performance (129 points | 15 comments)
20. An update on Dart macros and data serialization (129 points | 101 comments)
21. We got hit by an alarmingly well-prepared phish spammer (168 points | 100 comments)
22. Keymapper: A cross-platform context-aware key remapper (51 points | 13 comments)
23. Younger cannabis users have reduced brain function, finds largest study yet (205 points | 157 comments)
24. Soviet Shoe Factory Principle (100 points | 81 comments)
25. I still like Sublime Text (1004 points | 524 comments)
26. Ötzi the Lyme Mummy (2019) (66 points | 22 comments)
27. Cardan grille (40 points | 4 comments)
28. Making the video that made Gorillaz (172 points | 39 comments)
29. Declassified CIA Guide to Sabotaging Fascism Is Suddenly Viral (17 points | discuss)
30. Dead Games (139 points | 48 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
